name: Supercars Christchurch Super 440
description: Ōtautahi Christchurch is geared up to welcome the Repco Supercars Championship to Ruapuna Motorsport Park.

location.name: Ruapuna Motorsport Park
location.address: Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map

price.text: Multiple transport options will be available to make getting to Ruapuna Raceway easy and hassle-free over the event weekend. View directions Google Maps . Spectators parking here will need to show a valid ticket to the event (including all passengers in the vehicle) and a valid NZ mobility parking permit clearly displayed on the front windscreen of the vehicle. Entry to this carpark for valid mobility car parking permits is free.

text_for_embedding: Supercars Christchurch Super 440 | Ōtautahi Christchurch is geared up to welcome the Repco Supercars Championship to Ruapuna Motorsport Park. | Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 17 - 19 April 2026 Address Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map Ticket info Buy tickets Supercars event details As Australasia’s premier touring car series, Supercars promises high-octane action, fierce competition and an unforgettable experience — and we can’t wait to see it all unfold right here in Christchurch in 2026. For the first time, drivers will battle it out on the iconic South Island circuit — led by Kiwi star Matt Payne, winner of the Jason Richards Memorial Trophy and now Bathurst 1000 champion. Fans from across Aotearoa can rally trackside to cheer on their 'King of the Mountain. ' Event weekend transport options available Multiple transport options will be available to make getting to Ruapuna Raceway easy and hassle-free over the event weekend. View directions Google Maps . Super shuttle from the city A 'Super shuttle service' will be running from the central city. This is a paid morning and nightly service, and return shuttle tickets can be purchased starting from $30. Free park n ride service There will be a free Supercars park n ride service running from the Canterbury Agricultural Park. With no booking necessary, attendees can drive to the Canterbury Agricultural Park, park their vehicle and take the free shuttle to the raceway. View directions on Google Maps . Free parking on-site There is free parking onsite, however this is limited and will be allocated on a first in first served basis. Overflows will need to head to the Canterbury Agricultural Park and take the free shuttle service to the event, or ticket holders can purchase a shuttle service to and from the city. Limited premium carparking There is also an option to purchase a premium carpark. This $120 add-on will score you a 3-day carpark just outside an entry gate. There is limited availability, and tickets need to be purchased online prior to arriving at the event. Upgrades underway at Ruapuna Raceway As Christchurch prepares to host Supercars, Ruapuna Raceway is undergoing targeted upgrades to meet track safety standards for its inaugural year. Led by the Canterbury Car Club and supported by Christchurch City Council, ChristchurchNZ, and Supercars, the immediate focus is on ensuring the circuit complies with all safety requirements for drivers and spectators. Infrastructure enhancements will continue in subsequent years, building on this foundation to elevate the venue into a world-class motorsport destination. Accessibility information An accessible viewing area will be located between turn 10 and turn 11, near gate B. Please purchase a Trackside General Admission ticket and email commercial@ticketek.co.nz to advise your requirements. The venue is a mix of sealed roads, dirt roads and grass. Viewing areas around the track are all raised above the racetrack, and therefore, there is a requirement to navigate inclines and descents around the venue. Corporate tickets can be purchased for the Engine Room, which caters to those using a wheelchair. There are also a number of wheelchair-friendly toilets in the precinct. Accessible parking Accessible parking will be located in the premium carpark. There are limited carparks in this location, which will be on a first-come, first-served basis. Spectators parking here will need to show a valid ticket to the event (including all passengers in the vehicle) and a valid NZ mobility parking permit clearly displayed on the front windscreen of the vehicle. Entry to this carpark for valid mobility car parking permits is free. If the carpark is full, patrons can head to the public carpark or to the park n ride at the Canterbury Agricultural Park (A&P showgrounds, 102 Curletts Road, Sockburn, Christchurch). Accessible buses will be operating throughout the day. Check back here for updates as more action unfolds in the lead-up to Supercars Christchurch Super 440 . name: The Art of Banksy
description: Enjoy over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist. This is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic pieces in New Zealand.

location.address: Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map

text_for_embedding: The Art of Banksy | Enjoy over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist. This is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic pieces in New Zealand. | Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 17 December 2025 - 27 January 2026 (excluding public holidays) Address Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map Ticket info Buy tickets now Event details The world-famous exhibition, The Art of Banksy, is coming to Christchurch this summer at Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre. With over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist, this is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic and thought-provoking pieces in Aotearoa NZ. From Girl with Balloon (Gold Edition) to Flower Thrower, this is an unmissable opportunity to get up close to authenticated Banksy artworks. Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox.
